interpretations.classical: Fork rising toward Mount of Jupiter indicates affection linked with ambition and leadership.
interpretations.modern: Emotional idealism; tendency to love those of higher virtue or position.

interpretations.classical: Break in the middle—emotional shock or separation.
interpretations.modern: Represents a major emotional event; recovery possible if line reconnects.

interpretations.classical: Contact with Mount of Saturn → serious, philosophical nature.
interpretations.modern: Deep thinker; possible melancholy if Heart line is weak.

interpretations.classical: Split at the end → change of residence or dual life path.
interpretations.modern: Late-life transition; travel or migration indicated.

interpretations.classical: Early interruption → childhood illness or accident.
interpretations.modern: Temporary setback in youth; strength later resumes.

interpretations.classical: Fate line from Mount of Moon → success through public or imaginative work.
interpretations.modern: Recognition via people’s favor; creative or service careers.

interpretations.classical: Deep and clear → artistic talent and stable fame.
interpretations.modern: Strong creative flow; sustained reputation via consistent effort.

interpretations.classical: Chained line → nervous weakness or digestion issues.
interpretations.modern: Irregular lifestyle or stress affecting energy balance.

interpretations.classical: Two lines → two significant attachments; not necessarily two marriages.
interpretations.modern: Dual emotional bonds; complex relationship journey.
Healing or communicative gift; refined nervous sensitivity.
